title: Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse; PS/2 and USB; 300 DPI; colors: red, gray, white
descriptions: Introducing the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse - the perfect combination of style, comfort, and precision. With its 300 DPI and PS/2 and USB connectivity, this mouse offers smooth and accurate tracking for all your computing needs. Available in three stylish colors - red, gray, and white - this mouse is not only functional but also adds a touch of elegance to your workspace. The trackball feature and side-to-side scrolling make navigation a breeze, while its ambidextrous design makes it suitable for both left-handed and right-handed users. Upgrade your computing experience with the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse.

Introducing the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse, the perfect blend of comfort and precision. With both PS/2 and USB connectivity options, a 300 DPI sensor, and available in stylish red, gray, and white colors, this trackball mouse is a must-have for any computer user.

The ergonomic design and trackball feature make it ideal for both left-handed and right-handed users. Its side-to-side scrolling and two-button functionality enhance your productivity and control. Made in China, this high-quality mouse is built to last.

Say goodbye to hand strain and hello to smooth, accurate tracking with the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse. Upgrade your workspace today!
